checkpointAccount(address).details: Prefer to use this function over it's view counterpart for contract -> contract interactions.

returns.acctData: Most recent account data written to storage.

checkpointAccountWithLimit(address,uint2.details: To use in the event that significant number of weeks have passed since last  heckpoint and single call becomes too expensive.

params._week: Week which we want to checkpoint to.

returns.acctData: Most recent account data written to storage.

checkpointGlobal().details: Also updates local storage values for total weights. Using this function over it's `view` counterpart is preferred for contract -> contract interactions.

params._max_stake_growth_weeks: The number of weeks a stake will grow for. Not including desposit week.
params._start_time: allows deployer to optionally set a custom start time. useful if needed to line up with week count in another system. Passing a value of 0 will start at block.timestamp.

depositAsWeighted(address,uint256,uint25.details: A deposit using this method only effects weight in current and future weeks. It does not backfill prior weeks.

params._idx: Index of the week to deposit to relative to current week. E.g. 0 = current week, 4 = current plus 4 growth weeks.

returns._0: ratio of account weight to gloabl weight in terms of 1e18.
ratio of account weight to gloabl weight in terms of 1e18.

getGlobalWeightAt(uint256).details: querying a week in the future will always return 0.

params.week: the week number to query global weight for.

params._caller: Address of the caller to approve or unapprove.
params._status: Enum representing various approval status states.

params._depositor: Address of account with depositor permissions.

withdraw(uint256,address).details: During partial withdrawals, this will always remove from the least-weighted first.

withdrawFor(address,uint256,address).details: During partial withdrawals, this will always remove from the least-weighted first.

acceptOwnership().notice: Allow pending owner to accept ownership

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the balance of underlying staked tokens for an account

checkpointAccount(address).notice: Get the current realized weight for an account

checkpointAccountWithLimit(address,uint2.notice: Checkpoint an account using a specified week limit.

checkpointGlobal().notice: Get the current total system weight

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit tokens into the staking contract.

depositAsWeighted(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Allows an option for an approved helper to deposit to any account at any weight week.

getAccountWeight(address).notice: View function to get the current weight for an account

getAccountWeightAt(address,uint256).notice: Get the weight for an account in a given week

getAccountWeightRatio(address).notice: Returns the ratio of an account's weight to global weight at current week.

getAccountWeightRatioAt(address,uint256).notice: Returns the ratio of an account's weight to global weight at specified week.

getGlobalWeight().notice: Get the system weight for current week.

getGlobalWeightAt(uint256).notice: Get the system weight for a specified week in the past.

setApprovedCaller(address,uint8).notice: Allow another address to deposit or withdraw on behalf of. Useful for zaps and other functionality.

setWeightedDepositor(address,bool).notice: Allow owner to specify an account which has ability to depositAsWeighted.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Set a pending owner which can later be accepted.

withdrawFor(address,uint256,address).notice: Withdraw tokens from staking contract on behalf of another user.
